links.title: Cuno: "There's a big smile on his lips, li..."
links.text: There's a big smile on his lips, like he can't believe what he's saying: "We fucking *saw* it, yo -- it was real."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "And you'll see it again. Now that y..."
links.text: And you'll see it again. Now that you *know* it's real, how long can it hide?

links.title: You: ""I shouldn't have taken a bath, the..."
links.text: "I shouldn't have taken a bath, the pheromone washed off!"

links.title: You: ""I should have taken the pheromone..."
links.text: "I should have taken the pheromone from Morell!"

links.title: You: ""I should have taken the pheromone..."
links.text: "I should have taken the pheromone from Morell!"

links.title: You: ""Damn, we should have helped the cr..."
links.text: "Damn, we should have helped the cryptozoologists."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't know what that means..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't know what that means -- Cuno just knows it was FUCKING GIANT. Holy hell..."

links.title: You: ""I could have learned something abo..."
links.text: "I could have learned something about the phasmid's behaviour. Searched for it with them."

links.title: Cuno: ""Man, quit beatin' yourself down, w..."
links.text: "Man, quit beatin' yourself down, we just discovered a GIANT INSECT. Ain't no one done that..." He looks across the water.

links.title: Volition: "He's right. Dust yourself off and m..."
links.text: He's right. Dust yourself off and move on. There will be other chances.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Relax. Now that you *know* it's her..."
links.text: Relax. Now that you *know* it's here -- how long can it hide?

links.title: You: ""Damn, I didn't know it would be *c..."
links.text: "Damn, I didn't know it would be *connected* to the case..."

links.title: You: ""You're right. It was GIANT.""
links.text: "You're right. It was GIANT."

links.title: Cuno: ""Damn right, we just discovered a G..."
links.text: "Damn right, we just discovered a GIANT INSECT. Ain't no one done that..." He looks across the water.

links.title: You: ""What in the name of *god* was that?""
links.text: "What in the name of *god* was that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Damn... Cuno's read about that shi..."
links.text: "Damn... Cuno's read about that shit in a *book*. Cuno's booked that shit. That was, like, a secret animal. Like one of those they *think* is real but haven't seen. The Insulindian phasmid..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno doesn't know anything about i..."
links.text: "Cuno doesn't know anything about it, though. Except you stink bad, which is why it left you."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You know who would know more -- a c..."
links.text: You know who would know more -- a cryptozoologist!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A cryptozoologist? Oh god, there wa..."
links.text: A cryptozoologist? Oh god, there was one...

links.title: You: ""The cryptozoologist! There was one..."
links.text: "The cryptozoologist! There was one in the bar. Maybe she knew something?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, cryptologist, exactly! Those..."
links.text: "Yeah, cryptologist, exactly! Those are the fucks who study them. This is *unreal*, man..." He runs out of breath.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "We'll find it again, man. We'll get..."
links.text: We'll find it again, man. We'll get it, junior officer Cuno thinks. We'll fuckin' nail that phasmid one day.

links.title: You: ""Where did it go?" (Look North.) Ca..."
links.text: "Where did it go?" (Look North.) Can *you* see it?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Between the reeds there -- it does..."
links.text: "Between the reeds there -- it doesn't like bein' out in the open. Shifty fuck... I saw it slip in there. It's gone now, but..." He pants. "Wow."

links.title: You: ""I think it went into the reeds the..."
links.text: "I think it went into the reeds there, on that islet..." (Point North.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, yeah right there -- it doesn..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah right there -- it doesn't like bein' out in the open. Shifty fuck. It's gone now, but..." He pants. "Wow."

links.title: You: ""How did it *do* that? Glide?""
links.text: "How did it *do* that? Glide?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, it walked on water, like a w..."
links.text: "Yeah, it walked on water, like a water spider, or like -- one of those water walkers..." He's lost for words, just pants from excitement. "This cop-shit is *insane*."

links.title: You: ""Who's gonna believe this?""
links.text: "Who's gonna believe this?"

links.title: Cuno: ""*Everyone*, yo! We gotta tell the..."
links.text: "*Everyone*, yo! We gotta tell the *world* about this. Case solved -- insect found. We're fuckin'... master detectives or some shit. We're *good*."

links.title: Authority: "He's truly satisfied with your perf..."
links.text: He's truly satisfied with your performance in Death Island right now.

links.title: You: ""What now?" (Continue.)"
links.text: "What now?" (Continue.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""What now..." the old man behind yo..."
links.text: "What now..." the old man behind you says suddenly. He's put his hand into the ash -- it's dirty and black.

links.title: Empathy: "In some kind of strange, semi-catat..."
links.text: In some kind of strange, semi-catatonic state.

links.title: Cuno: ""Our suspect's not looking so good...."
links.text: "Our suspect's not looking so good. We need to check on him -- also, man..." he points to the reeds.

links.title: Cuno: ""It looks like the insect had some..."
links.text: "It looks like the insect had some kind of *nest* there -- look. Like a hoard, or some shit..."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "In the reeds, where he's pointing,..."
links.text: In the reeds, where he's pointing, you see a flash of white -- *porcelain* white.

links.title: You: ""Damn it! Damn it! I didn't get it..."
links.text: "Damn it! Damn it! I didn't get it right..." [Leave in rage.]

links.title: Suggestion: "You never had a chance. There was s..."
links.text: You never had a chance. There was something off the moment you approached it... The creature didn't *like* you.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And you, a detective of the RCM, st..."
links.text: And you, a detective of the RCM, standing there with your mouth agape -- alone and dumbfounded.

links.title: You: "(Yell.) "No!""
links.text: (Yell.) "No!"

links.title: The Deserter: "Your voice echoes alone on the wate..."
links.text: Your voice echoes alone on the water. Not so much as a scoff from the old man.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Three-hundred metres inland, on the..."
links.text: Three-hundred metres inland, on the jetty, special consultant Trant Heidelstam cups his ear. Satellite-Officer Vicquemare nods to him: "I heard it."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""He must be *really* out of it, yel..."
links.text: "He must be *really* out of it, yelling like that. Well, at least he's *alive*...." Officer Minot in the blue uniform frowns: "Jean, maybe something *happened*? He's in distress..."

links.title: You: ""I don't understand... I *had* the..."
links.text: "I don't understand... I *had* the pheromone...."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about, *phero..."
links.text: "What are you talking about, *pheromone*?" The strange state the old man is in ends, momentarily. Something in the word animates him...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Like a junkie..."
links.text: Like a junkie...

links.title: The Deserter: "...and then he is back to staring a..."
links.text: ...and then he is back to staring at the dust.

links.title: You: ""God, I shouldn't have taken a bath..."
links.text: "God, I shouldn't have taken a bath! The pheromone washed off!"

links.title: You: ""I should have taken the pheromone!""
links.text: "I should have taken the pheromone!"

links.title: You: ""I should have helped the cryptozoo..."
links.text: "I should have helped the cryptozoologists. It's too late now..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Crypto-what?" Some odd connotation..."
links.text: "Crypto-what?" Some odd connotation catches the old man's ear.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Crypto-*fascist* probably."
links.text: Crypto-*fascist* probably.

links.title: Volition: "Subdue the regret. Dust yourself of..."
links.text: Subdue the regret. Dust yourself off, proceed. You'll get it in the next life, where you don't make mistakes. Do what you can with this one, while you're alive.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Now that you know it exists -- you..."
links.text: Now that you know it exists -- you can get it another day. It can't hide forever...

links.title: You: ""What in the name of god was that?""
links.text: "What in the name of god was that?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What was what?" The straggler look..."
links.text: "What was what?" The straggler looks around. "It's just the reeds, playing tricks on you, droite..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You know who would know -- a crypto..."
links.text: You know who would know -- a cryptozoologist!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A cryptozoologist? Oh god, there wa..."
links.text: A cryptozoologist? Oh god, there was one...

links.title: You: ""The cryptozoologist... there was o..."
links.text: "The cryptozoologist... there was one in the bar. I bet she knew something..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't..." He's extending his han..."
links.text: "I don't..." He's extending his hand into the dust now, for some odd reason. Smearing his finger in it, like a confused child...

links.title: You: "It's not use telling him..."
links.text: It's not use telling him...

links.title: The Deserter: "Looks like you're right. He's exten..."
links.text: Looks like you're right. He's extending his hand into the dust now, for some odd reason. Smearing his finger in it, confused like a child...

links.title: You: ""No one will believe me... no one w..."
links.text: "No one will believe me... no one will believe this was real."

links.title: The Deserter: "Wordless, he's staring at the ash...."
links.text: Wordless, he's staring at the ash. Not responding to your yelling.

links.title: Logic: "The lieutenant had a *camera*. A ca..."
links.text: The lieutenant had a *camera*. A camera, he could have taken a picture. Now they'll all think you're mad...

links.title: You: ""Dammit. What now?" (Continue.)"
links.text: "Dammit. What now?" (Continue.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""What now..." the old man behind yo..."
links.text: "What now..." the old man behind you repeats suddenly. He withdraws his hand from the ash -- it's dirty and black.

links.title: Empathy: "In some kind of strange, semi-catat..."
links.text: In some kind of strange, semi-catatonic state. He's not looking so good.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Look! In the reeds, where the phasm..."
links.text: Look! In the reeds, where the phasmid was hiding -- you see a little flash of white -- porcelain white. In a nest of some sort?

links.title: You: ""Damn it! Damn it! I didn't get it..."
links.text: "Damn it! Damn it! I didn't get it right..." [Leave in rage.]

links.title: You: "Approach carefully."
links.text: Approach carefully.

links.title: You: "Retreat slowly. [Leave.]"
links.text: Retreat slowly. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't just leave it standing th..."
links.text: "We can't just leave it standing there. We have to do *something*, detective. It could be..." He thinks. "It could be connected somehow even..."

links.title: Empathy: "You've never seen him get this exci..."
links.text: You've never seen him get this excited. His voice is almost trembling.

links.title: Cuno: ""Wait, we have to do something!""
links.text: "Wait, we have to do something!"

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "The ghost insect watches you diseng..."
links.text: The ghost insect watches you disengage, continuing its hypnotizing motion. It's unclear whether it even registers that you're going...

dialogueTree.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "The creature stands on long stilt-l..."
dialogueTree.text: The creature stands on long stilt-like legs, antennae hanging from its head like a woman's hair -- white and curled at the tips. It is no more than five steps away from you.

links.title: Suggestion: "The segmented antennae move with ap..."
links.text: The segmented antennae move with apprehension, searching for something... you.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Take long, deep breaths. Slow down..."
links.text: Take long, deep breaths. Slow down your pulse. Don't move yet, and when you do -- be light as a feather.

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "Reed-like tufts stick out of its jo..."
links.text: Reed-like tufts stick out of its joints. As the insect moves its forearms it produces a faint hiss -- like a reel-to-reel machine spinning after the tape breaks.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The hiss is different from the stri..."
links.text: The hiss is different from the strings you heard before. It says something *else*, in a lower pitch...

links.title: Suggestion: "The segmented antennae move with ap..."
links.text: The segmented antennae move with apprehension, searching for something that's not there...
